title: [pytorch][build] ‘vmsLog2’ was not declared in this scope
body_html:
I tried to rebase and rebuild torch from source today, but got an error:
../aten/src/ATen/cpu/vml.h:68:76: error: ‘vmsLog2’ was not declared in this scope

See full gist.

For future reference, getting rid of old mkl install in /opt/intel and updating mkl via conda seems to have solved the issue.

cc @soumith @cpuhrsch
body_text:

cc @soumith @cpuhrsch
body:
I tried to rebase and rebuild torch from source today, but got an error:
`../aten/src/ATen/cpu/vml.h:68:76: error: ‘vmsLog2’ was not declared in this scope`

See [full gist](https://gist.github.com/elanmart/8fca075c596378bd785abd8079567684).

For future reference, getting rid of old `mkl` install in `/opt/intel` and updating `mkl` via `conda` seems to have solved the issue.

cc @soumith @cpuhrsch
